item.title: Perplexity与微软达成人工智能云服务协议，正值其与亚马逊的纠纷之际
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Perplexity与微软公司达成7.5亿美元协议，将使用其Azure云服务。此前该公司与长期云服务合作伙伴亚马逊公司陷入法律纠纷。【原文：AI startup Perplexity inked a $750 million deal with Microsoft Corp. to use its Azure cloud service amid a legal feud with Perplexity’s longtime cloud partner, Amazon.com Inc.】

item.title: 美国向石油公司发放在委内瑞拉运营的许可证
item.description: 特朗普政府颁布了一项通用许可证，扩大了石油公司在委内瑞拉的运营能力，标志着在美方支持的新领导层执掌加拉加斯后，美国显著放宽了对该国的制裁力度。【原文：The Trump administration issued a general license expanding the ability of oil companies to operate in Venezuela, marking a significant to step ease sanctions under the new US-backed leadership in Caracas.】

item.title: 苹果销售额超预期，iPhone创下季度销售纪录
item.description: 苹果公司假日季度营收远超华尔街预期，主要得益于新款iPhone 17的强劲需求、服务业务的增长以及中国市场的复苏。【原文：Apple Inc.’s revenue in the holiday quarter trounced Wall Street estimates, driven by strong demand for the new iPhone 17, growth in services and a rebound in China.】

item.title: 美国敦促中国让"严重低估"的人民币升值
item.description: 美国财政部称人民币汇率“严重低估”，并呼吁中国允许人民币汇率及时有序地升值。【原文：The US Treasury characterized the yuan as “substantially undervalued,” and called on China to allow its exchange rate to strengthen in a timely and orderly way.】

item.title: 美国已调查有关WhatsApp聊天不私密的指控
item.description: 据彭博新闻社采访及一份特工报告显示，尽管Meta公司宣称其聊天服务具有私密性和加密性，但美国执法部门一直在调查前Meta平台公司承包商的指控——称Meta员工能够访问WhatsApp消息。【原文：US law enforcement has been investigating allegations by former Meta Platforms Inc. contractors that Meta personnel can access WhatsApp messages, despite the company’s statements that the chat service is private and encrypted, according to interviews and an agent’s report seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 硅谷政策论坛将强调保持美国在人工智能领域的领先地位
item.description: 据主办方透露，备受瞩目的科技行业领袖与美国政策制定者聚会——山谷论坛，将在华盛顿举行的下一届峰会上聚焦两大议题：维护美国在人工智能领域的领先地位，以及拓展先进制造业版图。【原文：The Hill and Valley Forum, a closely watched gathering of tech industry leaders and US policymakers, will focus its next summit in Washington on preserving the American lead in artificial intelligence and expanding advanced manufacturing, according to the organizers.】

item.title: 五角大楼与加拿大5N Plus达成协议
item.description: 美国国防部向加拿大5N Plus公司投资1800万美元，助力该公司扩建金属锗精炼产能。该金属广泛应用于夜视系统等领域。受此消息影响，该公司股价飙升19%。【原文：The US Department of Defense made an $18 million investment in Canada’s 5N Plus Inc. to help the company expand refining capacity for germanium metal, which is used in night-vision systems and other applications. The shares soared 19%.】

item.title: 联邦快递股价创2021年以来新高，得益于成本削减计划
item.description: 联邦快递公司股价收于历史新高，有望延续六个月的涨势。市场对其成本削减措施信心日益增强，加之经济环境表现强韧，预计将利好运输行业。【原文：FedEx Corp. shares closed at a record high, putting them on track for a six-month rally amid growing confidence in the company’s cost-cutting efforts and a resilient economic backdrop that’s expected to favor the transportation sector.】

item.title: 病毒式应用Moltbot展现人工智能代理未来的残缺图景
item.description: 开发者、风险投资家和早期采用者都迫不及待地试用了该产品。【原文：Developers, venture capitalists and early adopters have eagerly tested out the product】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亚马逊正与OpenAI洽谈，拟投资高达500亿美元
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，亚马逊公司正与OpenAI洽谈投资事宜，投资额可能高达500亿美元。这笔交易将加速全球最大云计算服务提供商与领先人工智能工具开发商之间的合作关系。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is in talks to invest as much as $50 billion in OpenAI, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, a deal that would accelerate ties between the world’s largest cloud-computing provider and the leading builder of AI tools.】

item.title: 苹果财报将揭示iPhone需求及人工智能战略
item.description: 纽约第五大道苹果专卖店。摄影师：迈克尔·纳格尔/彭博社【原文：The Apple Fifth Avenue store in New York. Photographer: Michael Nagle/Bloomberg】

item.title: 太平洋投资管理公司总裁称私募信贷买家对风险"视而不见"
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司表示，投资者在追逐私人信贷领域丰厚收益时，往往低估了其中的风险。【原文：Investors underestimate the hazards when chasing fat yields in private credit, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: Grubhub将免除50美元以上餐厅订单的费用
item.description: Grubhub宣布免除所有超过50美元的餐厅订单的配送费和服务费，这是这家新近私有化的外卖应用为从竞争对手DoorDash和优步手中吸引顾客所采取的最新举措。【原文：Grubhub is removing delivery and service fees on all restaurant orders above $50, the latest move by the newly private food-delivery app to lure customers from rivals DoorDash Inc. and Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 路透社报道：SpaceX在IPO前与xAI进行合并谈判
item.description: 路透社报道称，在火箭和卫星制造商SpaceX即将进行重磅IPO之际，其创始人埃隆·马斯克正与旗下人工智能公司xAI商讨潜在合并事宜。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX is in discussions with his artificial intelligence firm xAI about a potential merger ahead of the rocket and satellite maker’s potential blockbuster IPO, Reuters reported.】

item.title: 美国高评级债券销售额突破2000亿美元，创年度开局新高
item.description: 美国投资级公司债券销售额已打破1月份的先前纪录，并首次突破2000亿美元大关，这是该债券销售额第六次突破2000亿美元大关。随着借款人利用降低的借款溢价，全球债务发行量激增，这成为其中的一部分。【原文：Sales of US investment-grade corporate bonds have smashed January’s prior record and exceeded $200 billion for just the sixth month ever, part of a global debt-issuance surge as borrowers take advantage of reduced borrowing premiums.】

item.title: 巴西经济疲软双重打击：数据双重利空
item.description: 巴西周四公布的数据显示，该国就业岗位月度减少幅度创下数年新高，贷款拖欠率也达到多年最高水平，这进一步表明拉丁美洲最大经济体的放缓态势正在加剧。【原文：Brazil posted the biggest monthly job loss and the highest loan delinquency rates in years according to data published on Thursday, the latest sign that the slowdown in Latin America’s largest economy is deepening.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席称将制定预测市场新规
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席周四表示，华尔街主要衍生品监管机构将为规模达数十亿美元的预测市场行业制定新规。【原文：Wall Street’s main derivatives regulator will write new rules for the multi-billion dollar prediction markets industry, the head of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission said Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行首席法律顾问西波隆称数字欧元保障战略自主权
item.description: 欧洲央行执行委员会成员皮耶罗·奇波隆表示，欧洲需要推出数字欧元，以确保其在支付领域不受域外支付服务商的制约。【原文：Europe needs a digital euro to guarantee its autonomy from payment providers outside the region, European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone said.】

item.title: 微软股价遭遇自DeepSeek重创英伟达以来最惨重跌幅
item.description: 微软公司周四有望创下历史纪录——若其市值跌幅维持至收盘，超过4000亿美元的市值蒸发将创下史上第二大跌幅。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is on track for the record books Thursday, as its more than $400 billion wipeout in stock market valuation would be the second-largest in history if it holds through the close.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯宣布启动新股份回购计划，利润大幅增长
item.description: 阿迪达斯集团公布了超出预期的第四季度利润，并宣布启动新的股票回购计划。这家德国品牌正通过复古运动鞋以及新款跑步和足球产品，力求保持其发展势头。【原文：Adidas AG reported stronger-than-expected fourth-quarter profits and announced a new share buyback program as the German brand looks to maintain its momentum with retro sneakers and new running and football products.】

item.title: 美国议员称英伟达参与了DeepSeek模型的"协同设计"
item.description: 据众议院中国事务委员会共和党主席透露，尽管美国出口管制旨在限制这家中国初创企业获取高端美国芯片，英伟达公司仍提供了技术支持，帮助DeepSeek改进其突破性人工智能模型。【原文：Nvidia Corp. provided technical support that helped DeepSeek improve its breakthrough artificial intelligence model despite US export controls designed to restrict the Chinese startup’s access to high-end American chips, according to the Republican head of the House China committee.】

item.title: 食品观察组织就婴儿奶粉召回事件向巴黎法院提起诉讼
item.description: 消费者组织"食品观察"周四就婴儿配方奶粉召回事宜向巴黎司法法院提起诉讼，此事件是席卷雀巢、达能及乐天集团等食品巨头的危机的一部分。【原文：Consumer group Foodwatch filed a complaint at the Paris Judicial Court on Thursday over an infant-formula recall, part of a crisis that’s engulfed food giants including Nestlé SA, Danone SA and Groupe Lactalis.】

item.title: 人工智能浪潮中，半数美国人面临电力短缺高风险
item.description: 电网可靠性监管机构的一份报告显示，未来五年内，多达1.51亿美国人面临电力短缺——甚至全面停电——的高风险，这主要归因于极端天气、天然气系统脆弱性以及电力需求的激增。【原文：As many as 151 million Americans are at high risk of power shortfalls — or outright blackouts — over the next five years because of extreme weather, natural gas system vulnerabilities and soaring electricity demand, according to a report by the grid reliability regulator.】

item.title: 美国试图平息对特朗普和平委员会将取代联合国的担忧
item.description: 特朗普政府正试图平息外界对其"和平委员会"意图取代联合国或将职权范围扩展至加沙地带以外地区的担忧。但该委员会的章程草案却暗示了相反的情况。【原文：The Trump administration is seeking to tamp down concerns that its Board of Peace aims to supplant the UN or have a remit extending beyond the Gaza Strip. Its own draft charter suggests otherwise.】

item.title: 苹果收购以色列人工智能初创公司，该企业专注于面部动作解读技术
item.description: 苹果公司已收购以色列人工智能初创企业Q.ai，该公司专注于开发解读面部动作及理解无声交流的技术。【原文：Apple Inc. has acquired Israel-based artificial intelligence startup Q.ai, which develops technology for reading facial movements and understanding silent communication.】

item.title: 科特拉与德文正就合并事宜进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，科特拉能源公司与德文能源公司正就合并事宜进行深入谈判，这将成为近年来规模最大的油气行业并购交易之一。【原文：Coterra Energy Inc. and Devon Energy Corp. are in advanced talks about a combination, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be one of the largest oil and gas deals in years.】

item.title: 英伟达与梅赛德斯-奔驰推进自动驾驶出租车计划
item.description: 英伟达公司与合作伙伴梅赛德斯-奔驰集团正加速推进在主要市场推出无人驾驶出租车服务的计划，该服务将采用这家德国汽车制造商的S级车型。【原文：Nvidia Corp. and partner Mercedes-Benz Group AG are pushing ahead with plans to offer robotaxi services in major markets, using the German carmaker’s S-Class model.】

item.title: 与特朗普家族有关联的加密货币公司计划斥资1亿美元回购股票
item.description: Alt5 Sigma Corp.是一家与特朗普家族加密货币项目有关联的金融科技公司，其股票交易量较低。该公司已批准最高1亿美元的股票回购计划，足以回购多达5000万股股票。【原文：Alt5 Sigma Corp., a thinly traded financial-technology firm with ties to a Trump family crypto venture, authorized a share buyback of up to $100 million, enough to repurchase as many as 50 million shares.】
